<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Wild Winds Initiate](/Feats.aspx?ID=463) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=112" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 163 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
ki spells

</column>

---

You learn a mystical stance that lets you attack from a distance. You gain the [_wild winds stance_](/Spells.aspx?ID=489) ki spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1. While entering the stance is a ki spell, the wind crash Strikes the stance grants are not, so you can use them as often as you like while in the stance.

<title level="2">Wild Winds Initiate leads to...</title>
[Electric Counter](/Feats.aspx?ID=2732), [Wild Winds Gust](/Feats.aspx?ID=478)
name: Wild Winds Initiate
